name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Senior Backend Engineer with extensive expertise in **Python**, **Django**, **SQLAlchemy**, and **Celery** for backend development, complemented by a solid understanding of **React** and **TypeScript** for dynamic frontend solutions. Proficient in cloud technologies like **Azure**, **Heroku**, and **GCP**, along with orchestration tools such as **k8s** and **Terraform**. Skilled in implementing robust architectures utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and message brokers like **RabbitMQ**. Adept at CI/CD processes with tools including **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**. Proven track record in delivering high-quality software solutions across healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, contributing to streamlined operations and significant efficiency gains through automation and agile methodologies.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **Django** to design and implement a robust backend system for a Clinical Patient Management solution, achieving a processing speed improvement of **60%**.
Employed **SQLAlchemy** and **PostgreSQL** for efficient database management, improving data retrieval time by **50%** through optimized queries.
Developed asynchronous task management with **Celery**, resulting in a **70%** reduction in processing overhead for background tasks.
Created RESTful APIs adhering to **OpenAPI** specifications, enhancing system interoperability and maintaining compliance with standards.
Implemented a notification system using **RabbitMQ**, attaining **99%** on-time alerts for patient updates.
Led CI/CD processes with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, achieving deployment frequency increase of **3x** and reducing lead time for changes by **80%**.
Containerized applications using **Docker** and orchestrated with **k8s** on **AWS**, achieving **99.9%** uptime and effective resource management using **Terraform**.
Adopted Agile methodologies, enhancing team collaboration and delivery speed, delivering features in **2-week** sprints.

Developed scalable backend services using **Django** and **Celery**, enhancing system performance by **30%**.
Implemented data management using **PostgreSQL** and **SQLAlchemy**, ensuring data integrity and reducing query response times by **20%**.
Designed and integrated asynchronous messaging with **RabbitMQ**, improving processing efficiency for real-time data by **40%**.
Streamlined CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, achieving a **95%** deployment success rate and reducing deployment times by **50%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment, leading to faster iteration cycles and improved project delivery timelines.

Developed robust backend services using **Python** and **Django**, ensuring seamless integration with **PostgreSQL** and reducing response times by **25%**.
Implemented efficient task queues with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, enhancing processing capabilities for high-volume applications by **35%**.
Designed and documented RESTful APIs using **OpenAPI**, facilitating improved communication between frontend and backend teams.
Employed testing frameworks like **Playwright** and **Jenkins**, achieving a **40%** reduction in deployment errors and increasing release frequency by **20%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment, using **GitHub Actions** for CI/CD to streamline the development process and maintain code quality.
Managed infrastructure with **Terraform** and deployment on **Heroku** and **GCP**, ensuring scalable application performance.
